Posts.Title: Building software for emergency response
Posts.Subtitle: How my software career started
Posts.Excerpt: I started my career back in 2014, as a part-time employee doing a project at the radio comm department at a small IT company in a small town in southern Skåne, Sweden. The company had developed a platform primarily for helping first responders (police, ambulance, firefighters). It consisted of the company's custom-made automation hardware which integrated with other technologies.
